text: Jwacheon Station () is a station of Busan Metro Line 1 in Jwacheon-dong, Dong District, Busan, South Korea. The station is unrelated to the Jwacheon Station of Korail. ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Busan Metro stations Category:Dong District, Busan Category:Railway stations opened in 1987 Category:1987 establishments in South Korea
title: Jwacheon station (Busan Metro)
